parameter.name: apikey
parameter.label: Rachio apikey
parameter.description: Visit Rachio Cloud Portal to create an apikey

parameter.name: pollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling/Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Seconds between fetching values from the cloud service

parameter.name: defaultRuntime
parameter.label: Default Runtime
parameter.description: Number of seconds to run a zone if no runtime is specified (=0)

parameter.name: callbackUrl
parameter.label: Callback URL
parameter.description: https://host.domain:port/rachio/webhook; make sure the selected port is forwarded to your openHAB node.

parameter.name: clearAllCallbacks
parameter.label: Clear Callbacks
parameter.description: If true all callbacks will be cleared on registrations.

parameter.name: ipFilter
parameter.label: IP Filter Address or List
parameter.description: Only accept events from the given IP address or subnet list, e.g. '192.168.1.1' or "192.168.1.0/24;192.168.2.0/24"

thing-type.label: Rachio Sprinkler Controller
thing-type.description: The things controls one sprinkler controller, which might have multiple zones.

channel-type.label: Name
channel-type.description: The name of the sprinkler controller. This could be configured using the Rachio App.

channel-type.label: Active
channel-type.description: ON: Controller is active, OFF: Controller is suspended

channel-type.label: Online
channel-type.description: ON: Controller is online, OFF: Controller is offline, check internet connection

channel-type.label: Paused
channel-type.description: OFF: Watering scheduled is enabled, ON: Watering schedule is paused

channel-type.label: Stop Watering
channel-type.description: ON: stop watering for all zones, OFF: n/a

channel-type.label: Run Multiple Zones
channel-type.description: ON: start watering for selected zones (''=ALL), OFF: n/a

channel-type.label: Run Zone List
channel-type.description: Zones to run at the same time (''=run ALL)

channel-type.label: Run Time
channel-type.description: =0, use default run time, >0: Start zones for given number of seconds

channel-type.label: Rain Delay
channel-type.description: >0: Rain delay device

channel-type.label: Last Device Event
channel-type.description: Events can be received when callback is configured.

channel-type.label: Latitude
channel-type.description: Latitude of the device location

channel-type.label: Longitude
channel-type.description: Longitude of the device location

channel-type.label: Running schedule
channel-type.description: Currently running schedule, if empty no schedule is running

thing-type.label: Rachio Sprinkler Zone
thing-type.description: A zone of a Rachio Sprinkler Controller

channel-type.label: Zone Name
channel-type.description: Name of the zone as configured in the Rachip App

channel-type.label: Zone Number
channel-type.description: Zone Number (1-16)

channel-type.label: Zone Enabled
channel-type.description: ON: Zone is enabled, OFF: zone is disabled)

channel-type.label: Run Zone
channel-type.description: ON: start watering, OFF: stop watering

channel-type.label: Zone Runtime
channel-type.description: Set > 0 to start zone for given secs

channel-type.label: Last Zone Event
channel-type.description: Events can be received when callback is configured.

channel-type.label: Available Water
channel-type.description: Available water for the zone.

channel-type.label: Root Depth
channel-type.description: Depth of the root for this zone.

channel-type.label: Size of the zone in sqft
Total Runtime
channel-type.description: Total runtime of the zone.

channel-type.label: Zone Image URL
channel-type.description: URL for the zone picture/image.

channel-type.label: Nozzle Head Category
channel-type.description: Type of the nozzle's head.

channel-type.label: Nozzle Inches per Hour
channel-type.description: Nozzle's inches per hour

channel-type.label: Nozzle Image URL
channel-type.description: URL for a nozzle image
